function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease spread in new living/working environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation and public health crises","Mitigation":"Integration of health-focused design principles and guidelines into architectural and urban planning practices","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, air purification technologies, touchless interfaces","People":"Occupants of new living/working environments, general public","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, public health officials"},{"Description":"Inadequate construction processes leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease spread during construction and building occupancy","Mitigation":"Implementation of stringent construction hygiene protocols and worker safety measures","Technologies":"Robotics for construction, autonomous equipment, remote monitoring systems","People":"Construction workers, building occupants","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, architects"},{"Description":"Lack of effective practice management for disease containment","Impact":"Difficulty in responding to disease outbreaks and managing public health crises","Mitigation":"Development of protocols for rapid response, contact tracing, and facility sanitation","Technologies":"Digital health records, contact tracing apps, remote monitoring and management tools","People":"Building managers, public health officials, occupants","Owner":"Building management companies, public health authorities"}]}
